definition: silver needle (fine needle used in acupuncture)

sentences.english: Our blend features Silver Needle, highest quality white tea, with Sakura.
sentences.chinese: 我们混合了功能银针，最优质的白茶与樱花。

sentences.english: One by one, needles makes faith return.
sentences.chinese: 一根银针，让那信念有了皈依。

sentences.english: The method is mainly used for processing the dried silver smelt meat.
sentences.chinese: 主要用于加工银针鱼鱼肉干。

sentences.english: In this way, you'll accurately experience the standard taste of Baihao Yinzhen.
sentences.chinese: 这样，您便可以准确体验到白毫银针音的标准味道了。

sentences.english: High quality dry tip green tea was chosen to fume with the jasmine .
sentences.chinese: 本品系选优质烘青银针绿茶，用茉莉花熏制而成。

sentences.english: The most famous varieties are "silver Needles White Fuzz" and "White Peony".
sentences.chinese: 著名的白茶品种为“白毛银针”和“白牡丹”。

sentences.english: Chroniger stiffens as Kumar inserts the small needles into his damaged neck.
sentences.chinese: 在小银针插入他的受伤的脖子时，库马尔全身僵直。

sentences.english: It has really tender leaves. The leaves have small and tiny hair.
sentences.chinese: 白毫银针是嫩嫩的茶芽，芽上面有白色的小细毛。

definition: needle used in embroidery or sewing/acupuncture needle/orange day-lily (Hemerocallis fulva)
spring-loaded arrow concealed in one's sleeve
to prick with a needle/to treat by acupuncture
to hit with a piercing blow
